cells.data:
{
	"binary_file_patterns":
	[
		"*.dds",
		"*.eot",
		"*.gif",
		"*.ico",
		"*.jar",
		"*.jpeg",
		"*.jpg",
		"*.pdf",
		"*.png",
		"*.swf",
		"*.tga",
		"*.ttf",
		"*.zip",
		"/Users/xiaoshitou/Desktop/demo/**",
		"themes/mytheme/node_modules/**"
	],
	"caret_extra_bottom": 0,
	"caret_extra_top": 1,
	"caret_extra_width": 0,
	"caret_style": "smooth",
	"color_scheme": "Packages/User/SublimeLinter/Monokai (Colorcoded) (SL).tmTheme",
	"draw_white_space": "all",
	"fade_fold_buttons": false,
	"font_face": "Roboto Mono",
	"font_size": 13,
	"highlight_line": true,
	"line_padding_top": 4,
	"original_color_scheme": "Packages/Color Scheme - Default/Monokai.tmTheme",
	"save_on_focus_lost": true,
	"show_encoding": true,
	"show_full_path": true,
	"sublime_enhanced_keybindings": true,
	"tab_size": 4,
	"theme": "Boxy Monokai.sublime-theme",
	"theme_dirty_accent_pink": true,
	"translate_tabs_to_spaces": true,
	"trim_trailing_white_space_on_save": true,
	"word_separators": "./\\()\"',.:<>~!@#%^&*|+=[]{}`~?",
	"word_wrap": true
}
